scenes.background: [Monica] sighs and rolls her eyes, while [Bob] checks his watch frequently.
scenes.description: 'Are we seriously going to delay this again? We need a plan that everyone sticks to.'

options.text: Let's try to outline a plan together so everyone knows their role.
options.analysis: You suggested collaboration to create a clear plan, showing good perception and balanced emotional regulation.

options.text: Monica, you're right. Bob, can we agree on a deadline?
options.analysis: You supported Monica's point and sought to establish a deadline, demonstrating empathy and social skills.

options.text: Monica, maybe we need to rethink our approach. Bob, any suggestions?
options.analysis: You suggested re-evaluating the approach, showing social skill but lower empathy and motivation.
